mapper.insert: insert into user_table (userid, userpw, username, phone, role, email, salt) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{role}, #{email}, #{salt})
insert into bizr_table (userid, userpw, username, phone, email, salt, bizrno) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{salt}, #{bizrno})
mapper.select: SELECT userid FROM ( SELECT userid FROM user_table UNION ALL SELECT userid FROM bizr_table ) WHERE userid = #{userid} GROUP BY userid HAVING COUNT(*) >= 1
select camping_idx from bookmark where user_idx = #{user_idx}
select review_idx from review_like where user_idx = #{user_idx}
mapper.update: update user_table set joinconfirm = 'N' where user_idx = #{user_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reserve r JOIN camping c ON r.camping_idx = c.camping_idx WHERE r.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND r.checkout = 'Y' ORDER BY r.reserve_idx ASC
select * from bookmark b join camping c on b.camping_idx = c.camping_idx where b.user_idx = #{user_idx}
SELECT COALESCE(u.userid, b.userid) AS userid FROM user_table u FULL OUTER JOIN bizr_table b ON u.email = b.email WHERE u.email = #{email} OR b.email = #{email}
